title: Warming Mexican beef casserole
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil, or as needed', '1kg beef, trimmed and diced', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 teaspoon grated root ginger', '1 tin chopped tomatoes', '125ml stock or water', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1 pinch salt and pepper']
